.: about :.

this one is a request!... search by yourself if you need info about this game!.



.: install :.

1.: Unrar with latest winrar or use 7zip!

2.: double click: tgod.exe ( must be done, 1st! )

3.: double click: MakeDesktopIcon.exe and run game with it.





S p e c i a l   I n f o   N o t e :

Some virus-scanner recognize the header of a packed exe 

( tgod.exe )

as a lame virus, (coz its thebyte by byte check error of em!.) 

Its almost certainly a false positive alert from overly protective 

heuristics you can read more about in your VirusTool-Manual or 

VirusTools-WebSite!. (heuristics).  

>>>  thank you for reading!.
